title: Delhi hotels see sold-out days amid G20 bookings
description: Hotels in Delhi are expecting a sold-out situation next month with the G20 summit taking place on 9th-10th September, with both five-star luxury hotels as well as alternative options profiting from the high increase in demand for accommodation. It was reported that some luxury hotels can command rates of up to â‚¹45,000 per night with the Taj Mahal New Delhi and the Leela Palace already having sold out.
